DOC.brief_summary: To determine improvement diagnosis papillary carcinoma detect mutation V600E BRAF retrospective case inconclusive cytologic diagnosis ( category III , IV V Bethesda System )
DOC.brief_title: APPLICATION OF MOLECULAR TECHNIQUES FOR IMPROVING THE DIAGNOSIS AND TREATMENT OF NODULAR THYROID LESIONS .
DOC.detailed_description: Aim study To determine improvement diagnosis papillary carcinoma detect mutation V600E BRAF retrospective case inconclusive cytologic diagnosis ( category III , IV V Bethesda System ) . Design : Retrospective observational study . Scope : The study peformed Pathology Service , cytological sample paraffin file post-diagnosis . Mutations detect pyrosequencing technique . Subject study : Cases histological diagnosis papillary carcinoma ( CP ) previous cytological diagnosis group III , IV V Bethesda , collect October 1989 July 2014 Corporació Parc Taulí . Methodology : - Identification case - Detection BRAF V600E mutation , initially histological material surgical specimen , present , detection cytological material . The statistical analysis use SPSS . Univariate bivariate analysis do . Results present form frequency table percentage qualitative variable average , median standard deviation quantitative variable . Pearson chi-square Fisher 's exact test apply . The Student test Mann-Whitney test perform quantitative variable .
DOC.criteria: Cases histological diagnosis papillary carcinoma ( CP ) previous cytological diagnosis group III , IV V Bethesda , collect October 1989 July 2014 Corporació Parc Taulí Non available cytological histological material
